verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>

How <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H575><s%> wilt thou <S%H4448>speak<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things? and how long shall the <S%H561>words<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> be like a <S%H3524>strong<s%> <S%H7307>wind?<s%>
Doth <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H4941>judgment?<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> doth the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H6664>justice?<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> thy <S%H1121>children<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against him, and he have cast them <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H3027>for<s%> their <S%H6588>transgression;<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> wouldest seek unto God <S%H7836>quickly,<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H410><s%> and make thy <S%H2603>supplication<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7706>Almighty;<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> wast <S%H2134>pure<s%> and <S%H3477>upright;<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> he would <S%H5782>awake<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> thee, and make the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of thy <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> <S%H7999>prosperous.<s%>
Though thy <S%H7225>beginning<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H4705>small,<s%> yet thy latter <S%H319>end<s%> should <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H7685>increase.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7592>inquire,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> of the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H1755>age,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> thyself to the <S%H2714>search<s%> of their fathers: <S%H1><s%>

(For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H587>we<s%> are but of <S%H8543>yesterday,<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>nothing,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> are a shadow: <S%H6738>)<s%>
Shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3384>teach<s%> thee, and <S%H559>tell<s%> thee, and <S%H3318>utter<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%> out of their <S%H4480>heart?<s%> <S%H3820><s%>
Can the <S%H1573>rush<s%> grow <S%H1342>up<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1207>mire?<s%> can the <S%H260>flag<s%> <S%H7685>grow<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H4325>water?<s%>
Whilst it is <S%H5750>yet<s%> in his <S%H3>greenness,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> cut <S%H6998>down,<s%> it <S%H3001>withereth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> other <S%H2682>herb.<s%>
So <S%H3651><s%> are the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> and the <S%H2611>hypocrite's<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%> shall perish: <S%H6><s%>
Whose <S%H834><s%> <S%H3689>hope<s%> shall be cut <S%H6990>off,<s%> and whose <S%H4009>trust<s%> shall be a <S%H5908>spider's<s%> <S%H1004>web.<s%>

He shall <S%H8172>lean<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> but it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5975>stand:<s%> he shall hold it <S%H2388>fast,<s%> but it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6965>endure.<s%>
He <S%H1931><s%> is <S%H7373>green<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and his <S%H3127>branch<s%> shooteth <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H1593>garden.<s%>
His <S%H8328>roots<s%> are <S%H5440>wrapped<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> the <S%H1530>heap,<s%> and <S%H2372>seeth<s%> the <S%H1004>place<s%> of <S%H68>stones.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> he <S%H1104>destroy<s%> him from his <S%H4480>place,<s%> <S%H4725><s%> then it shall <S%H3584>deny<s%> him, saying, I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> thee.
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>earth<s%> <S%H6083><s%> shall <S%H312>others<s%> <S%H6779>grow.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> <S%H410>God<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> cast <S%H3988>away<s%> a <S%H8535>perfect<s%> man, <S%H3808>neither<s%> will he <S%H2388>help<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the evildoers: <S%H7489><s%>
Till <S%H5704><s%> he <S%H4390>fill<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H7814>laughing,<s%> and thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> with <S%H8643>rejoicing.<s%>
They that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame;<s%> and the dwelling <S%H168>place<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall come to <S%H369>naught.<s%>
